      Takes an email for a User and retrieves all account information for that User that is stored in the user table of the database.

      Get all tax returns for a user with email as a parameter

      Checks to see if the user is an employee and then calls the parcel broker to retrieve parcels based on passed information.

      Returns the role/permission level of the user connected to the session ID passed
      static User UserManager.getUser(java.lang.String email) 
      static boolean TaxReturnManager.hasReturnForYear(java.lang.String email, int taxYear)

      Initializes values in this class with entries from the config file.
      private static void SessionManager.init() 
      private static void ParcelManager.init()

      static boolean ParcelManager.isVisibleToUser(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String parcelID)
      Returns true if email is allowed to view this parcel
      static boolean UserManager.loggedIn(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String ip)
      Utilizing the parameters that have been passed, this method verifies with the User database to check whether or not the user is currently logged in somewhere.
      static boolean UserManager.login(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String sessionID, java.lang.String ip)
      Takes an email, password, and ip to be utilized in logging in to the website assuming the password passed matches the User tied to the email passed.
      static boolean UserManager.recover(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String ip)
      Sends a password recovery email to a valid user.
      static boolean UserManager.recoveryChangePass(java.lang.String newPass, java.lang.String confirmPass, java.lang.String verificationID, java.lang.String ip)
      Changes the password for a recovery attempt, but only if the verification id checks out and both passwords match.
      static javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest UserManager.setAccountInfo(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, java.lang.String email)
      Updates the info of the user who sent the given request.
      static boolean UserManager.tooManyAttempts(java.lang.String email)
      Checks logs for login attempts from email, if too many attempts return true
      static boolean UserManager.verification(java.lang.String verificationID, int verificationType)
      Verifies that the given user has been sent a verification email.

      Encrypts the incoming stream as an encrypted document with the given name and returns a record of the document.

      Encrypts the file at the given filepath and returns a record of the document.
      static java.lang.String EncryptionService.encryptString(java.lang.String unencrypted)
      Encrypts the given String object into an array of bytes.

      Fetches a String containing all the text in the given file.
      static java.lang.String ConfigService.fetchFromConfig(java.lang.String option)
      Fetches a String from the line with the given option from the config file.
      private static javax.crypto.SecretKey EncryptionService.getKey(java.lang.String toHash, java.lang.String salt)
      Creates an instance of a SecretKey object according to rules in the config file using the toHash and salt.
      static java.lang.String EncryptionService.getSalt()
      Returns a random String object that is 32 characters long.
      static java.lang.String EncryptionService.hash(java.lang.String toHash, java.lang.String salt)
      Takes the String passed into the method and hashes it for security purposes.
      private static void PDFService.init()
      Initializes the config-derived semi-constants in this class.
      private static void EncryptionService.init()
      Initializes encryption constants from the config.
      private static void EmailService.init()
      Initializes the static attributes in this class from config.
      private static void BackupService.init()
      Initializes the private static methods in BackupService.
      static boolean BackupService.restore(java.io.InputStream in)
      Restores the system to a previous backup that is specified by the user.

      Sends an email to a user that is trying to recover their lost password.

      Sends an email to a user that is trying to register a new user.
